languages.text: The Grand Strategist chooses one of the {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Combat Tactics{/g} areas. For 1 round, all enemies in that area are forced to re-roll successful {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} against all attacks. Any enemies that suffer damage and are left with less than {uip|MinimumWounds|ab86bcee2036424c90dd12c2ad3fab39} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} immediately die.
languages.original_text: Великий стратег выбирает одну из зон Стратегического плана. На 1 раунд все противники в зоне обязаны повторно выполнять {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверки{/g} при удачном {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонении{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парировании{/g}. Все противники, у которых после получения урона осталось менее {uip|MinimumWounds|ab86bcee2036424c90dd12c2ad3fab39} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}, немедленно погибают.

traits.locale_text: The Strategist chooses one of the Combat Tactics areas. For 1 round, all enemies in that area are forced to re-roll successful dodge and parry tests against all attacks. Any enemies, that suffer damage and have less than 2×(Strategist 's INT+FEL bonus) wounds after it, immediately die.

The Strategist chooses one of the Combat Tactics areas. For 1 round, all enemies in that area are forced to re-roll successful dodge and parry tests against all attacks. Any enemies that suffer damage and are left with less than (2 × (Strategist 's INT + FEL bonus)) wounds, immediately die.

The Grand Strategist chooses one of the Combat Tactics areas. For 1 round, all enemies in that area are forced to re-roll successful {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} against all attacks. Any enemies that suffer damage and are left with less than {uip|MinimumWounds|ab86bcee2036424c90dd12c2ad3fab39} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} immediately die.

The Strategist chooses one of the Combat Tactics areas. For 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, all enemies in that area are forced to re-roll successful {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} against all attacks. Any enemies that suffer damage and are left with less than {uip|MinimumWounds|ab86bcee2036424c90dd12c2ad3fab39} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, immediately die.

The Grand Strategist chooses one of the Combat Tactics areas. For 1 round, all enemies in that area are forced to re-roll successful {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} against all attacks. Any enemies that suffer damage and are left with less than {uip|MinimumWounds|ab86bcee2036424c90dd12c2ad3fab39} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} immediately die.

languages.text: Великий стратег выбирает одну из зон {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Стратегического плана{/g}. На 1 раунд все противники в зоне обязаны повторно выполнять {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверки{/g} при удачном {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонении{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парировании{/g}. Все противники, у которых после получения урона осталось менее {uip|MinimumWounds|ab86bcee2036424c90dd12c2ad3fab39} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}, немедленно погибают.
languages.original_text: The Grand Strategist chooses one of the {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Combat Tactics{/g} areas. For 1 round, all enemies in that area are forced to re-roll successful {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} against all attacks. Any enemies that suffer damage and are left with less than {uip|MinimumWounds|ab86bcee2036424c90dd12c2ad3fab39} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} immediately die.

traits.locale_text: Великий стратег выбирает одну из зон {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Стратегического плана{/g}. На 1 раунд все противники в зоне обязаны повторно выполнять {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверки{/g} при удачном {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонении{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парировании{/g}. Все противники, у которых после получения урона осталось менее {uip|MinimumWounds|ab86bcee2036424c90dd12c2ad3fab39} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}, немедленно погибают.

Стратег выбирает одну из зон Стратегического плана. На 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g} все противники в зоне обязаны повторно выполнять проверки при удачном уклонении и парировании. Все противники, у которых после получения урона осталось менее (2 × ({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} ИНТ + ОБЩ стратега)) здоровья, немедленно погибают.

Стратег выбирает одну из зон Стратегического плана. На 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g} все противники в зоне обязаны повторно выполнять проверки при удачном уклонении и парировании. Все противники, у которых после получения урона осталось менее {uip|MinimumWounds|ab86bcee2036424c90dd12c2ad3fab39} здоровья, немедленно погибают.

languages.text: 战略大师选择一片{g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}战斗策略{/g}区域。在一轮内，该片区域内的所有敌人每当受到攻击，且{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}成功时，都需要再次进行检定，只有再次检定成功才能成功闪避或招架攻击。所有敌人受到伤害之后，若剩余{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}低于{uip|MinimumWounds|ab86bcee2036424c90dd12c2ad3fab39}，则会立刻死亡。
languages.original_text: The Grand Strategist chooses one of the {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Combat Tactics{/g} areas. For 1 round, all enemies in that area are forced to re-roll successful {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} against all attacks. Any enemies that suffer damage and are left with less than {uip|MinimumWounds|ab86bcee2036424c90dd12c2ad3fab39} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} immediately die.

traits.locale_text: 战略大师选择一片战斗策略区域。在一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}内，该片区域内的所有敌人每当受到攻击，且{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}成功时，都需要再次进行检定，只有再次检定成功才能成功闪避或招架攻击。所有敌人受到伤害之后，若剩余{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}低于（2×（战略大师的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}+{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）），则会立刻死亡。

战略大师选择一片战斗策略区域。在一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}内，该片区域内的所有敌人每当受到攻击，且{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}成功时，都需要再次进行检定，只有再次检定成功才能成功闪避或招架攻击。所有敌人受到伤害之后，若剩余{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}低于{uip|MinimumWounds|ab86bcee2036424c90dd12c2ad3fab39}，则会立刻死亡。

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}战略大师{/g}选择一片战斗策略区域。在一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}内，该片区域内的所有敌人每当受到攻击，且{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}成功时，都需要再次进行检定，只有再次检定成功才能成功闪避或招架攻击。所有敌人受到{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}之后，若剩余{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}低于{uip|MinimumWounds|ab86bcee2036424c90dd12c2ad3fab39}，则会立刻死亡。

languages.text: El gran estratega elige una de las zonas designadas por {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Tácticas de combate{/g}. Durante 1 asalto, todos los enemigos presentes en esa zona se ven obligados a repetir las {g|Encyclopedia:Test}pruebas{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g} que hayan realizado con éxito contra cualquier ataque. Todos los enemigos que sufran daño y se queden con menos de {uip|MinimumWounds|ab86bcee2036424c90dd12c2ad3fab39} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} mueren inmediatamente.
languages.original_text: The Grand Strategist chooses one of the {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Combat Tactics{/g} areas. For 1 round, all enemies in that area are forced to re-roll successful {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} against all attacks. Any enemies that suffer damage and are left with less than {uip|MinimumWounds|ab86bcee2036424c90dd12c2ad3fab39} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} immediately die.

traits.locale_text: El gran {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}estratega{/g} elige una de las zonas designadas por Tácticas de combate. Durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, todos los enemigos presentes en esa zona se ven obligados a repetir las {g|Encyclopedia:Test}pruebas{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g} que hayan realizado con éxito contra cualquier ataque. Todos los enemigos que sufran {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} y se queden con menos de {uip|MinimumWounds|ab86bcee2036424c90dd12c2ad3fab39} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} mueren inmediatamente.

El estratega elige una de las zonas designadas por Tácticas de combate. Durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, todos los enemigos presentes en esa zona se ven obligados a repetir las {g|Encyclopedia:Test}pruebas{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiva{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g} que hayan realizado con éxito contra cualquier ataque. Todos los enemigos que sufran daño y se queden con menos de {uip|MinimumWounds|ab86bcee2036424c90dd12c2ad3fab39} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} mueren inmediatamente.

languages.text: Der Großstratege wählt eines der {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Gefechtstaktiken{/g}-Gebiete aus. Eine Runde lang werden alle Feinde in diesem Gebiet dazu gezwungen, erfolgreiche {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g}- und {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Proben{/g} gegen sämtliche Angriffe zu wiederholen. Alle Feinde, die Schaden erleiden und weniger als {uip|MinimumWounds|ab86bcee2036424c90dd12c2ad3fab39} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} haben, sterben augenblicklich.
languages.original_text: The Grand Strategist chooses one of the {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Combat Tactics{/g} areas. For 1 round, all enemies in that area are forced to re-roll successful {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} against all attacks. Any enemies that suffer damage and are left with less than {uip|MinimumWounds|ab86bcee2036424c90dd12c2ad3fab39} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} immediately die.

traits.locale_text: Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}Großstratege{/g} wählt eines der Gefechtstaktiken-Gebiete aus. Eine {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang werden alle Feinde in diesem Gebiet dazu gezwungen, erfolgreiche {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g}- und {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Proben{/g} gegen sämtliche Angriffe zu wiederholen. Alle Feinde, die {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} erleiden und weniger als {uip|MinimumWounds|ab86bcee2036424c90dd12c2ad3fab39} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} übrig haben, sterben augenblicklich.

Der Stratege wählt eines der Gefechtstaktiken-Gebiete aus. Eine {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang werden alle Feinde in diesem Gebiet dazu gezwungen, erfolgreiche {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}Ausweichen{/g}- und {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Proben{/g} gegen sämtliche Angriffe zu wiederholen. Alle Feinde, die Schaden erleiden und weniger als {uip|MinimumWounds|ab86bcee2036424c90dd12c2ad3fab39} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} übrig haben, sterben augenblicklich.

languages.text: Le grand stratège choisit l'une des zones de {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Tactiques de combat{/g}. Pendant 1 round, tous les ennemis présents dans cette zone doivent repasser des {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g} pour toutes les attaques. Les ennemis qui subissent des dégâts et dont la réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} est inférieure à {uip|MinimumWounds|ab86bcee2036424c90dd12c2ad3fab39} succombent immédiatement.
languages.original_text: The Grand Strategist chooses one of the {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Combat Tactics{/g} areas. For 1 round, all enemies in that area are forced to re-roll successful {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} against all attacks. Any enemies that suffer damage and are left with less than {uip|MinimumWounds|ab86bcee2036424c90dd12c2ad3fab39} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} immediately die.

traits.locale_text: Le Stratège choisit l'une des zones de Tactiques de Combat. Pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, tous les ennemis présents dans cette zone doivent repasser des {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g} pour toutes les attaques. Les ennemis qui subissent des dégâts et dont la réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} est inférieure à (2 × ({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FRA{/g} du Stratège)) succombent immédiatement.

Le Stratège choisit l'une des zones de Tactiques de Combat. Pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, tous les ennemis présents dans cette zone doivent repasser des {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parade{/g} pour toutes les attaques. Les ennemis qui subissent des dégâts et dont la réserve de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} est inférieure à {uip|MinimumWounds|ab86bcee2036424c90dd12c2ad3fab39} succombent immédiatement.

languages.text: 大戦略家は軍略エリアをひとつ選択する。1ラウンドの間、エリア内のすべての敵はすべての攻撃に対して、{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に成功した場合、再判定しなければならない。ダメージを受け、残り{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}が{uip|MinimumWounds|ab86bcee2036424c90dd12c2ad3fab39}未満になった敵は即死する。
languages.original_text: The Grand Strategist chooses one of the Combat Tactics areas. For 1 round, all enemies in that area are forced to re-roll successful {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} against all attacks. Any enemies that suffer damage and are left with less than {uip|MinimumWounds|ab86bcee2036424c90dd12c2ad3fab39} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} immediately die.

traits.locale_text: 大戦略家は軍略エリアをひとつ選択する。1ラウンドの間、エリア内のすべての敵はすべての攻撃に対して、{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に成功した場合、再判定しなければならない。ダメージを受け、残り{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}が{uip|MinimumWounds|ab86bcee2036424c90dd12c2ad3fab39}未満になった敵は即死する。

戦略家は軍略範囲をひとつ選択する。1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、範囲内のすべての敵はすべての攻撃に対して、{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}回避{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に成功した場合、再判定しなければならない。ダメージを受け、残り{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}が{uip|MinimumWounds|ab86bcee2036424c90dd12c2ad3fab39}未満になった敵は即死する。

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerStrategistGlossary}大戦略家{/g}は軍略範囲をひとつ選択する。1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、範囲内のすべての敵はすべての攻撃に対して、{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に成功した場合、再判定しなければならない。{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受け、残り{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}体力{/g}が{uip|MinimumWounds|ab86bcee2036424c90dd12c2ad3fab39}未満になった敵は即死する。

languages.text: Büyük Stratejist, {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Çatışma Taktikleri{/g} alanlarından birini seçer. O alanda bulunan tüm düşmanlar, herhangi bir saldırıya karşı başarılı olan {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturma{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}testine{/g} yeniden girmek zorunda kalır. Hasar alarak {uip|MinimumWounds|ab86bcee2036424c90dd12c2ad3fab39} değerinden daha az {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanı kalan tüm düşmanlar anında ölür.
languages.original_text: The Grand Strategist chooses one of the {g|f:e4e45f74936c4740b7bc03013f6991ba}Combat Tactics{/g} areas. For 1 round, all enemies in that area are forced to re-roll successful {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} against all attacks. Any enemies that suffer damage and are left with less than {uip|MinimumWounds|ab86bcee2036424c90dd12c2ad3fab39} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} immediately die.

Any enemies that suffer damage and are left with less than {uip|MinimumWounds|ab86bcee2036424c90dd12c2ad3fab39} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} immediately die.

For 1 round, all enemies in that area are forced to re-roll successful {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} against all attacks. Any enemies that suffer damage and are left with less than {uip|MinimumWounds|ab86bcee2036424c90dd12c2ad3fab39} {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} immediately die.
